bibl.title: When Epigraphy Meets Art History: On St Phoibammon from Abdallah-n Irqi.
Aegyptus et Nubia Christiana. The Włodzimierz Godlewski Jubilee Volume on the Occasion of his 70th Birthday.

bibl.note: Offers a new reading of a wall inscription discovered in the central church of Abdallah-n Irqi [in the Abu Simbel Area]. According to the new interpretation the text includes an annual date which allows to date the wall painting. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Grzegorz Ochała, When Epigraphy Meets Art History: On St Phoibammon from Abdallah-n Irqi.
A. Łajtar, A. Obłuski & I. Zych (edd.), Aegyptus et Nubia Christiana. The Włodzimierz Godlewski Jubilee Volume on the Occasion of his 70th Birthday (Warsaw, 2016) pp. 513-524, 1 tabl., 2 figg.

Offers a new reading of a wall inscription discovered in the central church of Abdallah-n Irqi [in the Abu Simbel Area]. According to the new interpretation the text includes an annual date which allows to date the wall painting. - Avec résumé en anglais.
